MemberSignature.Value: public Azure.AI.Projects.ToolResources ToolResources { get; set; }

Docs.summary: A set of resources that are made available to the agent's tools in this thread. The resources are specific to the type of tool. For example, the `code_interpreter` tool requires a list of file IDs, while the `file_search` tool requires a list of vector store IDs.
